techmeme.title: Lumikai projects India's gaming market to grow from $3.8B in 2024 to $9.2B in 2029; the number of gamers in India reached 591M in 2024, up from 568M in 2023 (Dean Takahashi/VentureBeat)
Q&A with Foursquare co-founder Dennis Crowley on his startup Hopscotch Labs, which uses AI and headphones to give information as a person walks by a location (Om Malik/Crazy Stupid Tech)
Research integrity specialists and scientific publishers raise concerns about the ease with which scientific data can be fabricated using generative AI tools (Diana Kwon/Nature)
An interview with Mozilla interim CEO Laura Chambers about Firefox's 20th birthday, growth due to the EU's DMA, privacy, the Google search deal, AI, and more (Frederic Lardinois/TechCrunch)
Gurman: Apple may release its second-generation Vision Pro between fall 2025 and spring 2026, and it could feature an M5 around when the first Macs get the chip (Michael Burkhardt/9to5Mac)
